args:
The weary party is attacked by the Blazewyrm.
However, the power of true love lets Mym
unleash an even greater attack, forcing
Leonidas into retreat. Later, in an attempt to
atone for her sins, Alex joins the prince's party.
Things should be reaching their\nconclusion ere long. ...Ah!
A roar of victory... The scent of blood...\nIt seems they have met their fate.

Though you may hold pacts with many
dragons, my little brother, not even you
are immortal. You have sunk into the
Flow Eternal.
We're not done here, Brother.\n...Alex? Are you all right?
Yes. And now that my life has been spared,\nI will not let it go to waste again!
Such a bother. I suppose I'll just have\nto bury the lot of you myself.
Uh oh. We ain't got the strength left\nto dance with this chump.
I owe you and Elisanne a debt,\nand I intend to pay it.
If it's a fight you want, Leonidas,\nyou can have it with me!
No, Alex. I will not allow this.
To sacrifice a part of my family so soon\nafter getting it back would violate every\nteaching of Ilia.
As a Paladyn, I shall be your shield,\neven if my body is burned to ruin.
Pointless theater and posturing!\nIt matters not which of you is the shield,\nfor the result will remain unchanged.
All that awaits you both is a fire that\nshall erase all trace of you from this life!
Ugh. What IS it with you humans and\nyour love affair with self-sacrifice?
You protect someone and die doing it,\nthen someone else goes and does the\nSAME THING! Don't you ever learn?!
Whose side are you on here, Mym?
This whole martyr thing you have\ngoing on REALLY needs to stop!
True love is when you protect someone\nAND live to see them again!
So you believe you have one among\nyou who can defend against the\nBlazewyrm's fury?
And who was it that turned tail and ran\nfrom the fires of Mars mere moments ago?
No, you're right. I ran earlier.\nBut now someone has lit a fire\nin the depths of my heart.
She's a real special gal—someone who\npoured her heart into saving the life of\nthe assassin who had come to take hers.
I'm not going to die here, Elly.\nLet me show you what real love looks like!
I'll protect my beloved darling\nand save you all in the process!
I shall burn every trace of this irritating\nquippery from the face of the earth!\nCome forth, Mars!
I pity you, Mars. You were once the envy\nof all fire dragons.
But you succumbed to your ambitions,\nsold off your spirit, and are now a mere\npuppet of your pactbound human.
Your pact is a lie, and you'll never be\nthe strongest with such false love!
Now let's pit your fabricated flames\nagainst my true love! Hwaaaaaaah!
AAAH HA HA HA HA! Burned to cinders!\nUnbound, Mars's fury razes all to...
You sure that wasn't just a mosquito bite?\nBecause that's what it felt like!
All that tasty fire mana helped me grow\nin new and VERY exciting ways.
I am now SUPER MYM, with the power\nto turn any foe to ash in an instant!\n...For a couple of minutes, anyway.
What witchery is this?! The Blazewyrm\nhas razed a hundred kingdoms,\nyet you absorb his flames?!
A hundred is nothing. Try three hundred!\nThat's how many years the love I hold\nhas been smoldering.
And now I'll show you just how hot\na fire dragon in love can burn!
The true conflagration of passion...\nULTIMATE MUSPELHEIM!
Ha ha ha! Some crown prince you are.\nKnow your place, boy! Know your... Muh?
Such impudence! Forcing ME to withdraw,\nif even for only a short while.
Huh. You've got more fight in you\nthan I expected.
I wield the power of Morsayati now.\nI've no need to dirty my hands on a\nminor skirmish such as this.
Remember well, my young brother:\nThe time for revolution is nigh.
Those who cling to former power will never\nwalk the path of conquest. You and your\ndragons will be scattered to the winds.
FINALLY! I thought he'd never shut up.\nRight then, here we go!
Like I'd let him harm my darling.\nPuh-leeeese!
Thank you for protecting us, Mym.
It was only natural when you consider\nour loving relationship!
Still, I ended up with a TON of mana\nfrom that Mars fellow.
When we get back to the castle, let's build\na flame dracolith as proof of our love!
You are something else, Mym.\nInstead of meeting your end, you only\ngrew in strength.
All right, let's head back to the Halidom.\nEr, you're welcome to come with us, Alex.
I cannot—not when my ledger of sins\nis so very long.
I must leave on a solitary journey\nof penance for my crimes.
But I thought you would go back\nto living the way you did before.
Forgive me, but I can never\nseek such peace.
Do you really think this journey\nwill allow you to atone?
Many people come to the Halidom seeking\nsuccor. Some are children, while some\nare lost in other ways.
If you really wish to atone, shouldn't you\nuse your strength to help such lost souls?
It's true that the path you walked\nmay have been a mistake.
But not everything you obtained on that\npath is a lie. Your strength, for one.
The sorrows you've known allow you\nto do things no one else can.
So lend us your aid—for the people,\nthe future, and my dream of creating a\nnation where everyone lives in happiness.
Still, I think it helps me understand\nwhy Elisanne follows you.
My blade and heart alike have been\nstained by my sins, yet you would\nstill accept me?
Well, as defeated soldiers have no true\nfreedom of their own, I shall bear\nmy shame and live under your roof.
But do not think of me as a friend. I have\nseen far too much of the darkness inside\npeople to consider forging a relationship.
For the nonce, I shall dedicate myself\nto atoning for my sins..
To think there was someone like you\nin my family, {player_name}.
However, only one star radiates in the sky.\nWhoever you might be, you will fail.
What weighs more on my mind is\nanother—the one who has taken\nthe body of the Auspex.
With one part returned, what will your\nnext move be, Zethia?
How is your condition, Your Majesty?
I have grown accustomed to the Auspex's\nbody, and my own has been recovered\nto some extent.
All that remains now\nis the greatest piece...
However, I shall commit myself to\ncareful observation for a while.
For now we come to the last of the royal\nfamily. What WILL that princess do...?
